original_title: ルパン三世 炎の記憶 〜TOKYO CRISIS〜
overview: Lupin's plans to intercept two old glass photographic plates from being delivered to a mysterious art dealer named Mr. Suzuki misfires, and it doesn't help matters that Goemon and Jigen are suffering from... efficiency problems. Meanwhile, Inspector Zenigata has a new tag-along in the Lupin chase: the beautiful young reporter Maria. But what is Maria's connection to the mysterious Mr. Suzuki?
tagline: A blazing crisis in Tokyo, or the photo op of a lifetime?
title: Lupin the Third: Tokyo Crisis
